subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Trevor Gretzky, son of the hockey great Wayne Gretzky, has committed to play baseball at San Diego State, where he will be coached by the Hall of Famer Tony Gwynn.
snippet: Trevor Gretzky, son of the hockey great Wayne Gretzky, has committed to play baseball at San Diego State, where he will be coached by the Hall of Famer Tony Gwynn.
